Oct. 7, 2017 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (First Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-first-section
None
Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Zoe Alexander (flugel) — Lewis Merthyr Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100. 5 bands competed.
Sept. 5, 2017, 2:46 p.m. July 4, 2020, 10:41 p.m.
1 Lewis Merthyr Band Craig Roberts
2 Abergavenny Borough Band Sean O'Neill
3 Briton Ferry Band Jeffrey Pearce
4 BTM Band Jeff Hutcherson
5 Ammanford Silver Band Glyn Rhys Davies
Withdrawn Blaenavon Town Band Unknown
